task.title: How to Preview and Browse Classroom Spaces on AirClassroom
task.shortdesc: In order to have the best experience on AirClassroom, finding the ideal space is crucial.

context.p: The AirClassroom site has several filters that let you narrow your results to more accurately match your preferences.

step.cmd: On the main page, enter your zip code and date of rental.
step.info: You should see a listing of all available spaces for your selected date and location.

step.note: On the left side of the screen, there's a set of drop-down menus that function as filters.
step.cmd: Select any number of filters according to your preferences, and the site will automatically update to only show spaces that fulfill all of your preferences.
step.stepxmp: For example, filter by projector availability. If you select "yes" from the drop-down menu, your list of spaces will shrink to only include those that have a projector available for use.

step.cmd: Click on a listing that you think is a good fit for what you're looking for.
Browse the room's listing page to get an idea of what it's like.

substep.cmd: Click on the left and right arrows below the image in the center to scroll through all of the images of that particular space.
Scroll down the page to see the specifications listing, where you can double check a space's amentites you may not be able to see from the pictures alone.
